ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3 ounce) package any flavor ramen noodles

cookingTips: Add noodles to boiling water and cook according to package directions
Drain noodles if too much liquid remains, then add tuna and cheese
Stir until cheese melts and coats the noodles evenly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This quick dorm meal is budget-friendly. Would you add frozen vegetables or hot sauce for nutrition and flavor?
